column4: mah2223:   did it ever run?   did you ever boot into it? and later on got messed up? or it never did?
hello and thank you for your help! it ran for a long time and then i foolishly allowed some upgrades from an unofficial repository and next thing i know i get "mount of root filesystem failed"
yeah, i totally can, and all my data is all there and everything seems to be in order!
thank you for your advice may i ask what you mean by "~/"?
